bodyText.description: Hi, my name is Madeline and I am a developer with 6 years experience in web development, strategy, and design. My experience includes managing the planning, design and development for many projects from concept to implementation. I am looking for an opportunity to use this experience and lead in a senior position to share my experience and knowledge to set up my team for success.

heading.title: A few favorite projects I've worked on

jobs.title: Developer
jobs.description: At Mediacurrent I get the opportunity to support and lead on a variety of projects with different technology stacks. One day I may be working with a decoupled React/Gatsby site, the next day I may be working with Drupal or Wordpress.

jobs.title: Supervisor, Web Services
jobs.description: At VCS I led the Web Services team. Our disctrict website had 128 subsites and about 70 school sites! My favorite project here was planning and leading the district website redesign for vscedu.org from SharePoint to Drupal

jobs.title: Web Content Manager
jobs.description: At Furniture Leisure I was a content manager and strategist for 5 eCommerce websites. Oversaw the relaunch of 2 eCommerce websites to an upgraded system, new design, and revamped content for SEO.

heading_skills.title: On a typical day I work with
